name: Time To Die (Jaylin Grierson, Lameosine)
description:
Created for GMTK Jam 2022 by Sanaa Memon and Jaylin Grierson

Time To Die is a top-down bullet hell where the player must survive as long as possible by dodging different dice, each with their own unique attacks. 

Players can additionally collect dice after their attacks have completed to earn bonuses depending on the dice combo they collect.

Controls: 

Keyboard: wasd to move, space to dash

Controller: dpad/joystick to move, a/b to dash
